name: S.S.A. Chapter 1
description:
S.S.A. is an RPG made by me. As my first game, it's pretty bad and it comes in multiple games with 1 chapter in each game, and you will have to physically load saves across games. The back story is- While you are driving home from work, you fall in a sink hole, which leads to a separate dimension where it's fight or flight to escape. Uncover secret areas, 20+ weapons, 3 classes, skills, tactics and much more in this top-down style RPG by Grudge Studios.

V1.33
